Subject: Unable to setup External Storage SMB share
Description: I am unable to create a external storage option in the EPP console. The path is PATH : /20240926-093756-CPFS-EPP_External/ and the server is isi-dcr10-nfs-ipc.iaas.ing.net
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c:
1. Setup the External Storage option for SMB.
2. Wait 3 to 5 minutes.
3. Test the connection with the available test button.
- Incorect credentials notification appears.
What_We_Know__c:
We logged into the Epp sever backend and tried to connect to the External storage.
We where able to ping and telnet to the external storage.
When running the mount command we received the permission error. (error = -13)
dmesg shows the command fail to login to the external storage.

The customer confirmed that the login can work only using a credential file.
As the Epp server does not have this functionality I asked the customer if they can allow the Epp server to use user and password to connect.
Next_Steps__c: Asked the customer today. if they can allow the Epp server to use user and password to connect.
Solution_Comment__c:
Info provided.
For SMB share we made sure the mountpoint is correct.
